## Methods

### safeFilename

▸ **safeFilename**(`filename`): `string`

Replaces any unsafe characters in the filename.

#### Parameters

| Name       | Type      | Description                |
| :--------- | :-------- | :------------------------- |
| `filename` | `unknown` | The filename to make safe. |

#### Returns

`string`

The safe filename.
